name: orange-summer-challenge-23-01
description: Welcome to the **MERN Stack CRUD Exam!** This exam is designed to test your understanding and proficiency in building a full-stack web application using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. The exam will assess your ability to create, read, update, and delete data from a database, as well as your knowledge of RESTful APIs, routing, and basic frontend development with React.js.
